name: GitHub Actions: Split Lint and TypeCheck
description: Separate jobs for linting and TypeScript type checks.

files.template:
name: CI Split

on: [push, pull_request]

jobs:
  lint:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: 20
          cache: 'npm'
      - run: npm ci
      - run: npm run -s lint || echo 'no lint'
  typecheck:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: 20
          cache: 'npm'
      - run: npm ci
      - run: npm run -s typecheck || npx tsc --noEmit || echo 'no typecheck'
